requirements.text: Deliver a full completion plan package grounded in current implementation state and defects.
Include an online research stage validating recency and soundness of stack choices.
Address contradictions that currently allow fail-open verification or confusing CLI behavior.
Include a working smoke integration test for end-to-end CLI verification flow.
Define deterministic quality gates and completion proof commands.

sources.trust_rationale: Primary repository documentation of project objective.
Direct source of CLI command wiring behavior.
Direct source of pass/fail decision path in verification.
Direct source of compare-branch handling and empty-list return.
Direct source of tool-runner parse-failure suppression.
Primary packaging and quality-gate command dependency declaration.
Direct source showing current smoke test scope.
Confirms semgrep parse failures are currently ignored.
Primary package index release recency for Typer.
Primary package index release recency for Ruff.
Primary package index release recency for Semgrep.
Official Semgrep CLI documentation for command behavior and CI usage semantics.
Primary package index release recency for diff-cover.
Maintainer repository README documents compare-branch and json-report flags in use.
Primary package index release recency for mypy.
Primary package index release recency for pytest.
Primary uv maintainer documentation, states production-readiness posture.

sources.source: uv run guardian --help and uv run guardian verify --help
sources.trust_rationale: Direct runtime evidence of current nested CLI UX behavior.
Current baseline quality gate result showing 7 passing tests.

sources.source: uv run ruff check . and uv run mypy src/ --ignore-missing-imports
sources.trust_rationale: Current lint and type-check baseline for deterministic gates.

notes: External recency sources E9-E17 were revalidated on 2026-02-08 against official package indexes or official documentation.
Semgrep exit-status reference was updated to an active official documentation entry to remove stale URL risk.
Diff-cover remains less frequently released than other stack components; retained because current usage is narrow and deterministic.
